channel.title: Hardware on Filippo Sanzeni

item.title: On Hardware Enshittefication
item.author: sanzenifilippo@gmail.com (Filippo Sanzeni)
item.description: A notoriusly good 3D printer manufacturer decided to alienate their customer base py pushing unnecessarily restrictive firmware updates. They are not the first company to engage in hardware enshittefication.

item.title: F91W Log 1
item.author: sanzenifilippo@gmail.com (Filippo Sanzeni)
item.description: Working on the power circuitry of a re-designed Casio F91W, now with wireless charging.
